PG App Store

This is a repository of apps to be used with F-Droid.

Currently it serves 3 apps. To add it to your F-Droid app, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this link:

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/knackwurstking/droid-repo/refs/heads/master/fdroid/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
F5 45 78 EC 16 4E 15 DD CA F4 C8 3D C5 33 E0 F0 B5 15 6F 60 91 41 10 DE 4A CF A3 D8 B8 EE 3F 4C
